snippet: Xiang Li sold more than 2,000 pirated software products worth more than $100 million, prosecutors say.
abstract: Xiang Li pleads guilty to one count of conspiring to steal copyrighted software, accused of selling more than 2,000 pirated products worth more than $100 million; Li faces five years in prison for the scheme.
lead_paragraph: Xiang Li sold more than 2,000 pirated software products worth more than $100 million, prosecutors say.

headline.main: Chinese Man Pleads Guilty in Copyright Violation Case
headline.print_headline: Chinese Man Pleads Guilty In Copyright Violation Case
